authors.author: Chester G. Allen Fanny Jane Crosby

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Tell of His excellent greatness,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Ever in joyful song.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Jesus our blessed Redeemer!
Sing, O earth,
His wonderful love proclaim,
Hail Him! Hail Him!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Highest archangels in glory,
Strength and honor
Give to His holy name.
Like a shepherd
Jesus will guard His children,
In His arms He carries them
All day long.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Jesus our blessed Redeemer!
For our sins He suffered
And bled and died,
He, our Rock,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Our hope of eternal salvation,
Hail Him! Hail Him!
Jesus the Crucified.
Sound His praises,
Jesus who bore our sorrows,
Love unbounded,
Wonderful, deep and strong.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Jesus our blessed Redeemer.
Heavenly portals,
Loud with hosannas ring,
Jesus, Savior,
Reigneth forever and ever,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Crown Him! Crown Him!
Prophet and Priest and King.
Christ is coming
Over the world victorious;
Power and glory
Unto the Lord belong.
